node.title: In or Around San Francisco? We’d Like You to Join Our Beta Tester Program
node.excerpt: We are looking for users in the San Francisco Bay Area to help us beta test new products and features. If you’ve ever wanted to get a sneak peek at what our team is working on and help improve our products, this is your chance. Our beta program allows our users to make their voices…

node.title: BitTorrent (BTT) now Accepted by NordVPN
node.excerpt: NordVPN now accepts BitTorrent (BTT) as a payment method for its award-winning security and privacy products. NordVPN, which services more than 8 million customers, adds BTT alongside an exclusive list of digital assets it accepts as payment. “BitTorrent Speed and BTT soon will enhance our popular Windows-based µTorrent Classic client, creating a vibrant BitTorrent ecosystem,”…

node.title: BitTorrent File System (BTFS) to Provide Decentralized Peer-to-Peer Storage
node.excerpt: BitTorrent is pleased to announce its plans to introduce decentralized storage as another blockchain solution into the BitTorrent ecosystem. BTFS, which is a variant of the open-source InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) protocol, will allow users to receive and host storage on their computers with other individuals and businesses.  By beginning testing of BTFS in May,…

node.title: Sign up for an Early Access Build of BitTorrent Live
node.excerpt: We are pleased to announce our BitTorrent Live streaming service, which will allow you to create live content and connect on mobile devices with people who share common interests. The service will allow for continuous live streaming anywhere users can get internet access, and you will be able to engage directly with the broadcasters to…

node.title: Statement 02/12/2019
node.excerpt: The TRON Foundation unveils more information regarding the frozen tokens held by its team: As of February 2019, the team members of the TRON Foundation hold 20% of BitTorrent (BTT) total supply, corresponding to 198,000,000,000BTT,  in which 192,500,000,000 are frozen and 5,500,000,000 are unfrozen. For safety reason, the frozen tokens will be stored in 296…

navText.Your purchase of digital coins via credi: Your purchase of digital coins via credit card is facilitated by a third party service provider, Simplex Payment Services UAB.
navText.BitTorrent does not facilitate this tran: BitTorrent does not facilitate this transaction and expressly disclaims all warranties related to this third party service.
navText.The crypto amount quoted is based on the: The crypto amount quoted is based on the current rate and is not final.
navText.If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5%: If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email from Simplex.
